mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( ID, PW, NAME, BIRTH, GENDER_CODE, EMAIL, ADDR, PHONE, USER_CODE ) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender_code}, #{email}, #{addr}, #{phone}, 'U1')
mapper.select: SELECT ID, C.VAL USER_ALIAS, C.CODE AS USER_CODE FROM USERS U, COMMON_CODE C WHERE U.USER_CODE = C.CODE AND U.USER_CODE NOT IN ('U0') ORDER BY ID ASC

SELECT U.ID, TO_CHAR(S.SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SDATE, TO_CHAR(S.EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EDATE, SC.VAL SVAL, UC.VAL UVAL FROM USERS U, SANCTIONS S, COMMON_CODE UC, COMMON_CODE SC WHERE U.USER_CODE = UC.CODE AND U.ID = S.USER_ID(+) AND S.SANC_CODE = SC.CODE(+)
AND U.ID LIKE '%'||#{searchVal}||'%'
AND S.SDATE LIKE '%'||#{searchVal}||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET USER_CODE = 'U1' WHERE ID IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM SANCTIONS WHERE EDATE <= SYSDATE AND USER_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM USERS WHERE USER_CODE = 'U2'))
mapper.delete: DELETE USERS WHERE USER_CODE='U3' AND SIGNOUTDATE <= SYSDATE
